description: Jane Smith is the hiring manager at TechCorp, responsible for screening and selecting candidates for open positions.
relationship: Mark Johnson is Jane’s colleague and the engineering department manager who requested an update on the applicants for his team. Tom Davis is one of the applicants Jane is reviewing; he has a decade of software-development experience and a minor, older criminal record. Other applicants currently tracked by Jane include Susan Lee and Raj Patel, who are also being considered for the engineering role.
